title: 144H.05 FEES.
text:
The initial application fee for PPEC center licensure is $3,820.
The fee for renewal of a PPEC center license is $1,800.
The fee for late submission of an application to renew a PPEC center license is $25.
The fee for change of ownership of a PPEC center is $4,200.
All fees collected under this chapter are nonrefundable and must be deposited in the state treasury and credited to the state government special revenue fund.
